import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a survey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/{SurveyId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a survey and unlinks any associated business rules.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SurveyId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) to find the survey. Extract `Item[].SurveyId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List surveys: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) -&gt; find survey to delete
2. Check linked rules: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/rules](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey-rules)
3. Delete survey: DELETE /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}

**Warning**: This permanently removes the survey. Linked rules will be updated to remove the survey reference. Historical responses are preserved but orphaned.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"SurveyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the survey to delete."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
